I don't think Mirafiori will stop auto production if the No vote prevails. We will fight to keep our jobs. Mirafiori is part of Sergio Marchionne 's 20 billion-euro investment project dubbed "Fabbrica Italia" to revamp Fiat's five remaining Italian car plants excluding Termini Imerese, which will stop producing cars by the end of 2011

The 6-foot-5, 241-pound Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. When then Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, General Colin Powell , was asked about the number of deaths the Iraqi military suffered, he said, I don't have a clue and I don't plan to undertake any real effort to find out. This is the same man who stated several months after Desert Storm that his goal was to "make the world scared to death of the United States."
